experience: You and James both know Tim Bangert, Amy Bangert, PHR, and 5 others

In charge of the technical infrastructure team, responsible for organizing, planning and monitoring all activities related to the technical PeopleSoft environment. Extensive experience in enterprise security and authorization, enterprise storage design and implementations, and web clustered design and secure load balancing.

Served as the Assistant Chief Information Officer with extensive experience and responsibility of large state wide application deployments support of 40,000 users.  Managed and recommended for all designs and implementations of all technologies in the office.Over 4 years of supervisory experience of up to 50 employees, project management experience in a multitude of projects, with planning and management of a budget in excess of $8 million. Hands on experience working with HP Proliant servers, HP EVA storage, Brocade SAN switches, Cisco LAN switches and firewalls, Cisco VPN, IBM Tivoli Storage Manager, IBM AIX, Sun Solaris, VMware ESX server, Microsoft Windows 2003, Microsoft clustering, Microsoft Active Directory, Microsoft IIS, Apache, Novell eDirectory, Novell Netware, LDAP, SUSE Linux, PolyServe Linux clusters, and Oracle Real Application Clusters.

System wide administrator with operational support responsibilities for over 1000 network users of which 600 were remote users.Designed and led the continual improvement of the network infrastructure while responsible for day-to-day operations.Implemented statewide roll out of a disconnected remote laptop backup and recovery solution to mitigate risk of data loss.Increased system availability and productivity by migrating system architecture from traditional file and print servers to a large file and print cluster
